text: What steps do I do to build up my confidence?

Just before I go on stage,
I start sweating and get crazy butterflies.

You get a little bit of nerves
and you have to take a deep breath.

Before I go on stage, I just remember that there’s
always songs that people will sing along with me.

People are out there for you,
so just go out there and have a good time.

My band will make horrible jokes.
We will dance.
I just have to make fun of myself. I’m very self-deprecating.

To build our confidence before a performance
is probably this right here:

We usually just bump Nicki Minaj or Kayne West
just to get us hyped before we go on stage.
Just get the nerves out, the little jitters.
